description: Sylvester Stallone shot to fame as Rocky Balboa, an unknown fighter who's given a shot at fighting world champ Apollo Creed as a publicity stunt.

title: Rosemary's Baby
cast: Mia Farrow, John Cassavetes, Ruth Gordon, Sidney Blackmer, Maurice Evans, Ralph Bellamy, Patsy Kelly, Elisha Cook Jr., Emmaline Henry, Charles Grodin
description: A woman is thrilled to find out she's pregnant. But as her belly grows, the more certain she becomes that her unborn child is in serious danger.

title: San Pietro
description: After the Allies invade Italy, the Liri Valley town of San Pietro becomes an example of the brutal effects of combat, both for soldiers and civilians.

title: Sangam
cast: Raj Kapoor, Vyjayanthimala, Rajendra Kumar, Lalita Pawar, Achala Sachdev, Hari Shivdasani, Raj Mehra, Iftekhar
description: Returning home from war after being assumed dead, a pilot weds the woman he has long loved, unaware that she had been planning to marry his best friend.

title: Scandal in Sorrento
cast: Vittorio De Sica, Sophia Loren, Lea Padovani, Antonio Cifariello, Tina Pica, Mario Carotenuto, Yoka Berretty, Virgilio Riento, Clara Crispo, Pasquale Misiano
description: When a marshal moves back to his hometown, he finds a woman renting his property who refuses to leave but soon captures his affection.

title: Schindler's List
cast: Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley, Ralph Fiennes, Caroline Goodall, Jonathan Sagall, Embeth Davidtz, Małgorzata Gebel, Shmulik Levy, Mark Ivanir, Beatrice Macola, Friedrich von Thun, Andrzej Seweryn
description: Oskar Schindler becomes an unlikely humanitarian, spending his entire fortune to help save 1,100 Jews from Auschwitz during World War II.

title: Searching for Bobby Fischer
cast: Max Pomeranc, Joe Mantegna, Joan Allen, Ben Kingsley, Laurence Fishburne, William H. Macy, Laura Linney, David Paymer, Michael Nirenberg, Robert Stephens
listed_in: Children & Family Movies, Classic Movies, Dramas
description: When a father learns that his 7-year-old son is a whiz at speed chess, he hires an implacable chess master to coach the boy for competitions.

title: Strictly Ballroom
cast: Paul Mercurio, Tara Morice, Bill Hunter, Pat Thomson, Gia Carides, Peter Whitford, Barry Otto, John Hannan
description: Dumped by his partner just before a major dance competition, gifted hoofer Scott Hastings is forced to take a graceless neophyte as his new partner.

title: Stripes
cast: Bill Murray, Harold Ramis, Warren Oates, P.J. Soles, Sean Young, John Candy, John Larroquette, John Voldstad, John Diehl, Lance LeGault, Judge Reinhold
description: After losing everything, an indolent sad sack impulsively joins the U.S. Army and cajoles his best friend into enlisting, too.

title: Superfly
cast: Ron O'Neal, Carl Lee, Sheila Frazier, Julius Harris, Charles McGregor, Nate Adams, Polly Niles, Yvonne Delaine
description: To get away from the thug life, cocaine dealer Youngblood Priest puts together one last deal that will net him enough money to start over.

title: The Battle of Midway
cast: Henry Fonda, Jane Darwell
description: Director John Ford captures combat footage of the Battle of Midway, an air and sea campaign that was a turning point in the war in the Pacific.

title: The Cincinnati Kid
cast: Steve McQueen, Edward G. Robinson, Ann-Margret, Karl Malden, Tuesday Weld, Joan Blondell, Rip Torn, Jack Weston, Cab Calloway, Jeff Corey, Theo Marcuse
description: In Depression-era New Orleans, cocksure stud poker player Eric Stoner – the titular Cincinnati Kid – challenges longtime champ Lancey "The Man" Howard to a showdown at the table, where a war of wills – and nerve – ensues.

title: The Crying Game
cast: Stephen Rea, Miranda Richardson, Forest Whitaker, Jaye Davidson, Adrian Dunbar, Breffini McKenna, Joe Savino, Birdie Sweeney, Andree Bernard, Jim Broadbent
description: IRA terrorist Fergus bonds with his prisoner, Jody. Jody tells Fergus of his girlfriend, Dil, with whom Fergus later falls in love.

title: The Evil Dead
cast: Bruce Campbell, Ellen Sandweiss, Richard DeManincor, Betsy Baker, Theresa Tilly, Bill Vincent, Scott Spiegel, Ivan Raimi, David Horton, John Cameron, Ted Raimi
listed_in: Classic Movies, Cult Movies, Horror Movies
description: During a stop at a remote cabin deep within the woods, a group of teens begins turning into flesh-eating zombies in director Sam Raimi's cult classic.

title: The Great Gambler
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Zeenat Aman, Neetu Singh, Prem Chopra, Utpal Dutt, Madan Puri, Om Shivpuri, Iftekhar, Sujit Kumar, Roopesh Kumar
listed_in: Action & Adventure, Classic Movies, Cult Movies
description: After unwittingly using his skills to obtain military secrets, a gambler is pursued by a police officer who happens to be his doppelgänger.

title: The Last Days of Chez Nous
cast: Lisa Harrow, Bruno Ganz, Kerry Fox, Miranda Otto, Kiri Paramore, Bill Hunter
description: Successful writer Beth's tepid marriage and home life face a new round of challenges when her footloose younger sister arrives for an extended visit.

title: The Longest Yard
cast: Burt Reynolds, Eddie Albert, Ed Lauter, James Hampton, Charles Tyner, Bernadette Peters, Richard Kiel, Joe Dorsey, Joe Jackson, Harry Caesar, John Steadman, Jim Nicholson, Tony Cacciotti
description: Washed-up professional quarterback Paul Crewe is sent to jail and forced to put together an inmate gridiron team to take on a group of prison guards.

title:
The Memphis Belle: A Story of a
Flying Fortress
description: This documentary centers on the crew of the B-17 Flying Fortress Memphis Belle as it prepares to execute a strategic bombing mission over Germany.

title: The Natural
cast: Robert Redford, Robert Duvall, Glenn Close, Kim Basinger, Wilford Brimley, Barbara Hershey, Robert Prosky, Richard Farnsworth, Joe Don Baker, John Finnegan
description: A gifted baseball player whose life has taken some startling turns becomes a 35-year-old rookie who helps a cellar-dwelling team get back in the game.

title: The Negro Soldier
description: This documentary urged African Americans to enlist and join in the effort to be part of America's continuing fight in World War II.

title: The Sign of Venus
cast: Sophia Loren, Franca Valeri, Vittorio De Sica, Raf Vallone, Virgilio Riento, Tina Pica, Lina Gennari, Eloisa Cianni, Leopoldo Trieste, Maurizio Arena, Franco Fantasia, Peppino De Filippo, Alberto Sordi
description: While suitors swoon over her cousin, a single woman takes initiative in finding herself a partner after receiving a favorable romantic fortune.

title: Thunderbolt
cast: James Stewart, Lloyd Bridges
description: A P-47 Thunderbolt squadron is shown in preparation, at play and in bombing raids aiming to halt Nazi supply lines and aid Allied ground troops.

title: True Grit
cast: John Wayne, Glen Campbell, Kim Darby, Jeremy Slate, Robert Duvall, Dennis Hopper, Alfred Ryder, Strother Martin, Jeff Corey
description: Teenage tomboy Mattie Ross enlists the help of crusty lawman Rooster Cogburn to track down the hired hand who murdered her father.

title: Tunisian Victory
director: Frank Capra, John Huston, Hugh Stewart, Roy Boulting, Anthony Veiller
cast: Burgess Meredith
description: British and American troops join forces to liberate a Nazi stranglehold in North Africa, sharing battles, hard work and a peaceful Christmas dinner.

title: Undercover: How to Operate Behind Enemy Lines
description: This World War II-era training film dramatizes how secret agents should act while undercover and how to avoid capture by enemies.

title: Westerplatte Resists
cast: Zygmunt Hübner, Arkadiusz Bazak, Tadeusz Schmidt, Józef Nowak, Tadeusz Pluciński, Bogusz Bilewski
description: At the onset of World War II, a Polish infantry lacking firepower fight to build a strong defense and protect their peninsula against enemy forces.

title: Who's That Knocking at My Door?
cast: Zina Bethune, Harvey Keitel, Anne Collette, Lennard Kuras, Michael Scala, Harry Northup, Susan Wood, Marissa Mathes, Catherine Scorsese
description: A woman's revelation that she was once raped sends her boyfriend, a reformed street thug, into an emotional and spiritual tailspin.

title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
cast: Gene Wilder, Jack Albertson, Peter Ostrum, Roy Kinnear, Julie Dawn Cole, Leonard Stone, Denise Nickerson, Dodo Denney, Paris Themmen, Ursula Reit
country: United States, East Germany, West Germany
listed_in: Children & Family Movies, Classic Movies, Comedies
description: Zany Willy Wonka causes a stir when he announces that golden tickets hidden inside his candy bars will admit holders into his secret confectionary.

title: Winter of Our Dreams
cast: Judy Davis, Bryan Brown, Cathy Downes, Baz Luhrmann, Peter Mochrie, Mervyn Drake, Margie McCrae
description: After the death of a long-ago lover, married philanderer Rob tracks down her friend, a drug-addicted prostitute desperate to escape her dead-end life.
